sentences.sentence: Therefore, the purpose of this study is to investigate the effects of parenterally infused three different fat emulsions on nutrient metabolism in septic rats.
sentences.translation: 故本研究之目的在探讨 全静脉营养输入不同脂肪乳剂后对败血症老鼠代谢之影响。

sentences.sentence: The raw AHG we used was derived from sheep, some of which, I was told, were so old that they had to be fed parenterally (again, I may have been fooled into believing this by naivety).
sentences.translation: 我们使用的原始AHG来自羊，有些人告诉，因为他们太老而必须肠外注射给他们喂食。
